item.title: Ace Your Physician Interview 🏥 • Research the healthcare facility thoroughly. • Prepare to discuss patient care philosophy. • Use: “I improved patient satisfaction by 20%.” • Have questions ready about team dynamics. • Practice explaining complex cases simply. How can you demonstrate your unique value to the healthcare team? #interview #healthcare #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
